snippet.title: Raft - The Renovation Update Trailer
snippet.description:
Hello Rafters! Summer is here and we are happy to announce that The Renovation Update is releasing on June 21! It is going to be a great time to hop on your Raft and get it nice and tidy in preparation for new future adventures!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/648800/Raft/

If you want to stay tuned for more Raft news and updates, don't forget to follow us on our social media as well! Here are the links:

Discord: https://discord.gg/raft
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RaftGame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RaftSurvivaGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/redbeetinteractive/
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/RaftTheGame
